Class FLOAD

  • java.lang.Object
    • FLOAD

  • public class FLOAD
extends java.lang.Object
    this is the re-engineering of a Fire Danger Legacy System the original source code was in Fortran and developed by William A.Main (1969) which was used to calculate National Fire Danger Rating Indexes. Fuel moisture, buildup index, and drying factor are also available.
